title: Include HTML validation/error log
body: The very first step in debugging is to be sure that there are no initial errors, so it would be great if MS Edge could optionally log HTML validation errors as the page loads, or upon validation request.

comments.body: The Chrome DevTools team experimented with HTML validation a few years ago. It lasted about a week in Canary before being pulled. HTML validation is simply too noisy on most sites. And while strict validation may fail, browsers are also fairly good at making it work anyways.
